markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Spiderfoot Brew](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1461)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=127" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105), [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 61 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This gelatinous, sticky fluid is made from the silk glands of giant spiders. When you drink a spiderfoot brew, tiny clinging hairs grow on your hands and feet, granting you a climb Speed and an item bonus to Athletics checks made to climb for the listed duration.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Limited"
>
Spiderfoot Brew (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder Special: Fumbus](/Sources.aspx?ID=105) pg. 0

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The climb speed is 25 feet, the item bonus is +3, and the duration is 1 hour.
name: Spiderfoot Brew (Major)
